mapper.insert: insert into feed (user_idx, stock, title, content, create_at) values (#{userIdx}, #{stock}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.update: update feed set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_at = now(), stock = #{stock} where user_idx = #{userIdx} and board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into feed_comment (user_idx, board_idx, content, create_at) values (#{userIdx}, #{boardIdx}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select c.comment_idx as commentIdx, c.board_idx as boardIdx, c.user_idx as userIdx, u.nickname as nickname, c.content as content, c.create_at as crerateAt, c.update_at as updateAt from feed_comment c join user u on c.user_idx = u.user_idx where c.board_idx = #{boardIdx} order by c.create_at desc limit #{pageNum}, 5
